report_format.name: CPE
report_format.description:
CPE stands for Common Product Enumeration. It is a structured naming scheme for information technology systems, platforms, and packages. In other words: CPE provides a unique identifier for virtually any software product that is known for a vulnerability.
The CPE dictionary is maintained by MITRE and NIST. MITRE also maintains CVE (Common Vulnerability Enumeration) and other relevant security standards.
The report selects all CPE tables from the results and forms a single table as a comma separated values file.
